name: Wani Wani Picnic: Playdate Edition
description:
Wani Wani Picnic: Playdate Edition Based off of the Famicase 2015 entry of the same name, created by HappyMappyArt. Please check out her artwork!

This is a port to the Playdate of my game, Wani Wani Picnic, created for A Game By Its Cover 2015 game jam.

How To Play "Guide Ally the hungry gator to the picnic. If any baddies get in your way, it's ok, just gobble 'em up! But something tells me Ally might get full before she reaches her goal!" "お腹空かせたわにの「アリーちゃん」をピクニックまで案内してね。敵は邪魔しようとしても、相手をもぐもぐ食べたら大丈夫だよ。でも、ピクニックまで着く前に、お腹いっぱいになりそうだね… ！"

Left / Right: Move

A Button: Jump / Confirm

B Button: Open Mouth (To Eat Enemies)

How to Install on your Playdate
  • Download WaniWaniPicnic.pdx.zip to your computer (thank you!)
  • Log in to your Playdate Account at play.date.
  • Go to Account > Sideload
  • Drag the downloaded .zip file onto the page
  • On your Playdate, go to Settings > Games
  • Refresh the list
  • Wani Wani Picnic should download and install onto your device!
